value.0: A rare and highly sought-after herb found only in the fields of Dantooine. The Dantooine Starwort is known for its vibrant blue petals that shimmer under the sunlight, resembling the twinkling stars in the night sky. This herb possesses potent medicinal properties, making it a valuable ingredient in healing potions and remedies. Its leaves are often used to create salves that can heal wounds and alleviate pain, while its petals are brewed into teas that boost the immune system and promote overall well-being. Due to its rarity and powerful effects, Dantooine Starwort is highly prized by healers and herbalists across the galaxy.
